import { Badge } from '@/registry/default/ui/badge'; import { Button } from '@/registry/default/ui/button'; import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardToolbar } from '@/registry/default/ui/card'; import { DropdownMenu, DropdownMenuContent, DropdownMenuItem, DropdownMenuSeparator, DropdownMenuTrigger, } from '@/registry/default/ui/dropdown-menu'; import { ArrowDown, ArrowUp, MoreHorizontal, Pin, Settings, Share2, Trash, TriangleAlert } from 'lucide-react'; const stats = [ { title: 'Total Sales', value: 892200000, delta: 0.2, lastMonth: 889100000, positive: true, prefix: '$', suffix: 'M', format: (v: number) => `$${(v / 1_000_000).toFixed(1)}M`, lastFormat: (v: number) => `$${(v / 1_000_000).toFixed(1)}M`, bg: 'bg-zinc-950', svg: ( ), }, { title: 'New Customers', value: 12800, delta: 3.1, lastMonth: 12400, positive: true, prefix: '', suffix: '', bg: 'bg-fuchsia-600', svg: ( ), }, { title: 'Refunds', value: 320, delta: -1.2, lastMonth: 340, positive: false, prefix: '', suffix: '', bg: 'bg-blue-600', svg: ( ), }, { title: 'Churn Rate', value: 2.3, delta: -0.1, lastMonth: 2.4, positive: false, prefix: '', suffix: '%', bg: 'bg-teal-600', svg: ( ), }, ]; function formatNumber(n: number) { if (n >= 1_000_000) return (n / 1_000_000).toFixed(1) + 'M'; if (n >= 1_000) return n.toLocaleString(); return n.toString(); } export default function StatisticCard2() { return (
{stats.map((stat, index) => ( {stat.title} Settings Add Alert Pin to Dashboard Share Remove
{stat.format ? stat.format(stat.value) : stat.prefix + formatNumber(stat.value) + stat.suffix} {stat.delta > 0 ? : } {stat.delta}%
Vs last month:{' '} {stat.lastFormat ? stat.lastFormat(stat.lastMonth) : stat.prefix + formatNumber(stat.lastMonth) + stat.suffix}
))}
); }

import { Badge } from '@/registry/default/ui/badge'; import { Button } from '@/registry/default/ui/button'; import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardToolbar } from '@/registry/default/ui/card'; import { DropdownMenu, DropdownMenuContent, DropdownMenuItem, DropdownMenuSeparator, DropdownMenuTrigger, } from '@/registry/default/ui/dropdown-menu'; import { ArrowDown, ArrowUp, MoreHorizontal, Pin, Settings, Share2, Trash, TriangleAlert } from 'lucide-react'; const stats = [ { title: 'Total Sales', value: 892200000, delta: 0.2, lastMonth: 889100000, positive: true, prefix: '$', suffix: 'M', format: (v: number) => `$${(v / 1_000_000).toFixed(1)}M`, lastFormat: (v: number) => `$${(v / 1_000_000).toFixed(1)}M`, bg: 'bg-zinc-950', svg: ( ), }, { title: 'New Customers', value: 12800, delta: 3.1, lastMonth: 12400, positive: true, prefix: '', suffix: '', bg: 'bg-fuchsia-600', svg: ( ), }, { title: 'Refunds', value: 320, delta: -1.2, lastMonth: 340, positive: false, prefix: '', suffix: '', bg: 'bg-blue-600', svg: ( ), }, { title: 'Churn Rate', value: 2.3, delta: -0.1, lastMonth: 2.4, positive: false, prefix: '', suffix: '%', bg: 'bg-teal-600', svg: ( ), }, ]; function formatNumber(n: number) { if (n >= 1_000_000) return (n / 1_000_000).toFixed(1) + 'M'; if (n >= 1_000) return n.toLocaleString(); return n.toString(); } export default function StatisticCard2() { return (
{stats.map((stat, index) => ( {stat.title} Settings Add Alert Pin to Dashboard Share Remove
{stat.format ? stat.format(stat.value) : stat.prefix + formatNumber(stat.value) + stat.suffix} {stat.delta > 0 ? : } {stat.delta}%
Vs last month:{' '} {stat.lastFormat ? stat.lastFormat(stat.lastMonth) : stat.prefix + formatNumber(stat.lastMonth) + stat.suffix}
))}
); }
